description: For the wahine (women) who want to wear their OluKai slippers year- round, they introduce the Kipe‘a Heu. This premium, plush, and shearling-wrapped sandal is inspired by their commitment to comfort. They’re so soft and warm, you’ll feel like you’re stepping into sun- drenched island sand.
name: KipeA Heu - Womens

specs.value: Shearling-wrapped straps create an ultra-comfy and customized fit
The anatomical PU footbed with a foam underlay and plush shearling cover delivers softness and cushioning. Featuring a full-grain, embossed leather logo patch for added style
Non-marking Wet Grip Rubber outsole featuring design inspired by tropical island ﬂora
This style features an embossed, full-grain leather footbed logo patch and a soft foam underlay for added cushion
